Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: I have found myself installing camera's for friends of mine.  This product is perfect for long runs, it has the power wires & the coax as a single strand.  Glad I found it.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Wires
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The power wires kept on breaking off when I try to strip it. Had to purchase a seperate cable for the power.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: BIG DOG
Reviews.Content: PRODUCT WORKED GREAT. JUST WHAT I NEED TO GET THE JOB DONE. WOULD BUY THIS PRODUCT ANYTIME AND WOULD TELL A FRIEND ABOUT.

Reviews.Title: exactly what i was looking for...
Reviews.Author: yazan daas
Reviews.Content: Exactly what i was looking for...excellent price..the diameter what i was looking for.. .. .. .. .. .. .. . .

Reviews.Title: 100% reliable siamese cable
Reviews.Author: Ted Wells
Reviews.Content: Although I prefer a pull box, the spools I bought were fine, always conducted. Didn't lose voltage with long runs. Needs a wrap of electrical tape with some compression connectors - may be the connectors design flaw. Video quality wasn't any different with a 175' run or a 50' run.

ProductInfo.Features:
RG59 20AWG CCS, with 18AWG Pure Copper Power Wire
60% Aluminum Braid 100% Aluminum Foil Shield
CM PVC Jacket
ISO 9001:2000, UL, RoHS Compliant.
Highly economical, Premium quality
ProductInfo.Name: RG59 Siamese PVC CCTV Coaxial Cable 500ft White
